paragraph.paragraph: This wizard enables you to create a empty Eiffel project, by specifying a root class and root feature for the system.
paragraph.heading: 2Navigation
paragraph.paragraph: To navigate to the desired page, select the page name which is displayed to the left hand side of the window.
To cancel the wizard at any point, select the Cancel button.
To complete the wizard, using the current settings, select the Finish button.
paragraph.heading: 2Page content
paragraph.paragraph: This wizard is comprised of the following pages:
paragraph.heading: 3Overview
paragraph.paragraph: This page displays the current settings that will be used when Finish is pressed.
paragraph.heading: 3System Settings
paragraph.paragraph: This page allows you to modify the settings for the system created when the wizard is completed. The following settings may be modified:

list.item: Root Class - Root class of the Eiffel system. A class of this name will be generated for inclusion in the system
Root Feature - Root feature of the Eiffel system. A feature of this name will be generated in the class Root Class. The root feature is the feature executed when the system is launched.
Project Type - The type of project to generate.
